post:
OWN data center operator Bacloud.com

Unbeatable KVM VPS PRO - 100% guaranteed NON OVERSOLD resources. High discounts available with payments in advance! https://www.bacloud.com/en/vps-pro

BaCloud Data Center introduces the new range of Linux / Windows PRO VPS servers. It’s next-generation virtualization servers, efficient and extremely reliable. All servers resources are 100% dedicated and this solution ensures maximum performance and stability. In PRO VPS we included extremely fast NVMe drives. These disks are new generation of technology that work up to 5 times more faster than SAS / SSD drives. NVMe drives uses PCI Express connections, that’s why disk read speed is up to 2.8 Gbps. PRO VPS servers recommended for customers who need very high read / write speed and stable performance.

Windows VPS:

1 x vCPU ( 24 VPS/ dual CPU node server ) , 5GB RAM, 100GB NVMe disk space, 1Gbps, Windows RDP licence included, IPv4 + IPv6 - *40.00€/mo Order page

2 x vCPU ( 12 VPS/ dual CPU node server ) , 10GB RAM, 250GB NVMe disk space, 1Gbps, Windows RDP licence included, IPv4 + IPv6 - *60.00€/mo Order page

4 x vCPU ( 6 VPS/ dual CPU node server ) , 20GB RAM, 500GB NVMe disk space, 1Gbps, Windows RDP licence included, IPv4 + IPv6 - *100.00€/mo Order page

8 x vCPU ( 3 VPS/ dual CPU node server ) , 40GB RAM, 800GB NVMe disk space, 1Gbps, Windows RDP licence included, IPv4 + IPv6 - *180.00€/mo Order page


Linux VPS:


1 x vCPU ( 24 VPS/ dual CPU node server ), 5GB RAM, 100GB NVMe disk space, 1Gbps, IPv4 + IPv6 - *20.00€/mo Order page


2 x vCPU ( 12 VPS/ dual CPU node server ), 10GB RAM, 250GB NVMe disk space, 1Gbps, IPv4 + IPv6 - *40.00€/mo Order page


4 x vCPU ( 6 VPS/ dual CPU node server ), 20GB RAM, 500GB NVMe disk space, 1Gbps, IPv4 + IPv6 - *80.00€/mo Order page


8 x vCPU ( 3 VPS/ dual CPU node server ), 40GB RAM, 800GB NVMe disk space, 1Gbps, IPv4 + IPv6 - *160.00€/mo Order page



* Listed monthly prices. Discounts up to 30% available with payments in advance.

Need more? We can offer server with up to 6 x NVMe drives with DUAL CPU machine.


Can't find server you need? We can help you! Please contact Sales@Bacloud.com or Skype: Andrius.Bacloud
